== Chiranellur (CT) (627777) ==

Chiranellur (CT) is a town in the [[Talappilly]] taluka of [[Thrissur]] district with an area of 6.52 sq. km. and harbouring 2240 households with total population of 9789 as per the 2011 Census. The district headquarter [[Thrissur]] is at a distance of 20 km. The state headquarter [[Thiruvananthapuram]] is at a distance of 325 km. Male population is 4608 and female population is 5181. Scheduled Caste population is 798 and Scheduled Tribes population is 18. Census Location Code of the town is 627777<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

Population wise class of the town is Class V (population_total 5,000 to 9,999).
The civic status of the town is 'Census Town'.

The nearest city with population more than 1 lakh is Thrissur (m corp.) at a distance of 20 km. The nearest city with population more than 5 lakh is Kochi (m corp. + og)  at a distance of 100 km. Railway station is at Guruvayoor at a distance of 15 km.
